website_summaries.verdict: You cannot go wrong with a school bus – they are nearly always a popular toy.
pros: School bus has a rounded shape
Top of the bus is open, allowing children to put figurines or other small toys on the bus to go for a ride
Solid construction made from recycled materials like all Green Toy products
Does not break easily under rough play
cons: The shape of the bus is a little off a traditional school bus

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bus!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son loves this toy. I bought the Character Pack and they fit pretty well in the seats (as shown). However, they do not fit behind the driver's seat. I was able to use a Lego Duplo Kid character though...he fit decently! I do wish the door opened and closed though.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: No return possible for item missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The item came yesterday and has two of the 4 hub caps missing. I am shocked to find out that I am not able to even return a damaged item. After having purchased many great Green Toys in the past, this will now be my last one. Things happen and items can occasionally be damaged. But telling a customer too bad so sad, you are stuck with the broken toy is unacceptable. Thank you Amazon customer service for quickly making this right. I now have a bus with 4 hub caps. My granddaughter loves this latest edition to my Green Toys collection. I am updating the bus to 5 stars and looking forward to more Green Toys from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: gudrun

customer_reviews.title: we have a lot of their vehicles and they are sturdy cute products
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of the green toys brand, we have a lot of their vehicles and they are sturdy cute products. I wish the bus had doors that opened and shut, making it slightly more interactive.
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: Great school bus toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old was beyond excited over this! We love this brand, safe and well made toys. They are made in the USA from recycled materials. Lead free. Very durable and fun! We own several toys from this brand and they are the best I have purchased. It's nice to not have to worry about the safety of the toys. I would definitely recommend this brand and this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Not eligible for return. Good toy.
customer_reviews.text: The toy is well made. My son did not like it as much as the dump truck. We had wanted to return it and buy a different green toy instead but Amazon refuse saying this item is not qualify for returns even though it is sold by Amazon service and it's only been 1 day. 4 star for the toy but minus one star for not being returnable. It's a nicely made toy but be sure you won't be returning it before buying from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: sloop09

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy! Indestructible is the best way to describe this toy and all other Green Toys products. I have a 3 year old, so it’s been used, well used. It’s bigger then the typical toys you see, so be aware of that. Rolls well and love that it doesn’t come with any plastic packaging, so easy to start to use. I highly recommend all their products.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: love the concept,  but the wheels fail miserably.
customer_reviews.text: Is a toy still considered "green" if it gets tossed in the recycle bin after owning it for a month? The favorite thing for my son and nephew (both 2-years old) to do in my house is push/race their toy trucks arround on the hardwood floors -- the hard-plastic wheels on this bus stink for this because they refuse to roll and slide instead. It might be a decent toy to bury in the sandbox or sink to the bottom of the pool, but it's not a good house toy. FYI...the firetruck from this company has the same issue with the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: jambrose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy - great approach to toy making.
customer_reviews.text: This school bus, just like the other toys I have purchased from Green Toys are great! The bus is durable, large enough to be a tank, and really well constructed. It definitely keeps the attention of my little guy, and I feel great about it being made from recycled milk jugs that help reduce pollution. I can’t wait to get more of these toys, and I must admit, I enjoy playing with the bus almost as much as the little guy likes seeing me pretend to pick up passengers!
customer_reviews.author: G.Felix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We love green toys and this bus is no exception. We appreciate the safe recycled materials and our kids love to play with these toys. This. Bus was one of ours well in advance Christmas purchases, so when we open it at Christmas time and realised that one of the wheels doesn't work properly it was too late to return it through Amazon. We contacted green toys customer service and explained our situation. Their response was very quick and they replaced the faulty toy within couple of days. We are pleased with the quality of these toys as well as with the excellent service provided.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan D Crissman

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Wheel wouldn't turn then fell off, inside mechanism that holds wheel was defective and warped. Not returnable?!?! I would like another!!!! Why don't you allow return of faulty toys? I actually really like this and so does my son. I love all your toys.
customer_reviews.author: tahitia maas

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves busses- this was supposed to be for Christmas but he got it early- he has slept with it every night since he’s gotten it. Very sturdy and worth the money- it’s a little smaller than I had wished for but he loves it so that’s all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Durable and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a tank. I mean it’s a bus, but might as well be a tank. We should be able to buy this in life size form and drive around in it. It’s been thrown down the stairs (uh “hills”) zoomed off the kitchen table (“cliffs”) drove thru mud and bulldozed thru snow, and it’s still going strong. It’s even been a couple years already. It’s the most durable thing in our house. Oh yeah and it’s been in the dishwasher several times. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My Son's Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's favorite toy, no exaggeration. It's durable, it's very attractive looking, and such a great little basic thing. No annoying sounds or lights, all plastic, made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Clara W.

customer_reviews.title: For tiny hands
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and easy for little hands to play, push and pick up. I've also purchased a airplane from this brand and it did not disappoint. I love how feather light it is and how easy it is for tiny hands to grip and play with.
customer_reviews.author: CCJE

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson plays with this quite often. He puts small plastic animals/people into it and drives it all around the room. It is well made and sturdy and feels like it will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: we bought this new, and right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: we bought this new, and right out of the box one of the wheels will not spin. And for some reason amazon will not let us return.
customer_reviews.author: Cat P

customer_reviews.title: great additon to grandson's fleet
customer_reviews.text: my grandson LOVES trucks, cars, tractors, anything on wheels. The school bus was a huge hit! Unfortunately, the figures I also purchased don't exactly fit but my grandson really doesn't care -he just throws them all in the bus and 'broom brooms' them off to school. Sturdy toy. Will probably get passed on to another generation or two.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys Make Great Gifts
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a number of the Green Toys products for my latest grandson. He plays with them constantly, and has yet to damage or break one. There's something about the design that draws my grandkid's attention.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: GT characters don't fit - boo
customer_reviews.text: I love Green Toys, and like everything else we have, it is sturdy and solid. However, I bought the GT character pack to have some people to ride the bus, but they don't fit in the seats. You can throw them in, but play opportunities are limited by this design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Heather HS

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these Green Toys. Super Duarable.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Only complaint I have is my daughter likes putting people and little items in\side and nothing really fit in the bus seats and she found this frustrating. We still have it and plays with it outside in the sand too.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and great gift
customer_reviews.text: We love all the green toys and the bus is super cute! It was a gift for my 6 year old and the 4 and 2 year old love playing with it too. Very durable, They can lean on it as they run it all around the house. Also it has little seats to put figurines in the bus or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: maximus

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys are the best!
customer_reviews.text: You cant go wrong with the Green Toys brand. My 2yo is obsessed with school buses. He will be so excited to open this on Christmas. My kids (4 & 2) are really rough with their toys and this brand always proves to be more durable than others.
customer_reviews.author: stacey cline

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: We have this out for kids to play with at my work and it’s always a popular toy. I bought it for a 2 year old birthday party and he absolutely loved it. His parents told me it’s one of his favorite toys now. I like it because it’s out all day at my work and I know it’s study because it gets banged around and we haven’t had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Always Impressed
customer_reviews.text: We are obsessed with all of our Green Toys and this School Bus is no exception. They are durable and so cute. They stand up to crazy toddlers and are dishwasher safe, so I’m always impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Cozzo

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bus. Larger than you'd think for the great ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable bus. Larger than you'd think for the great price here on Amazon. I got it as an upcoming present so I don't know how my son will like it, but I'm pretty sure he is going to adore this. It is awesome. We love green toys!
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: Wheels don't turn
customer_reviews.text: The wheels indeed do NOT turn when pressure is put on the bus. The wheels are too close to the bus frame above them so the frame pushes on them if any weight is put on the top of the bus. My daughter wanted to push this on her knees so that fault didn't work for us. 2 stars for the recycled plastic and cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these toys. So durable, great size and they are washable. We own about 7+ of these brand green toys and plan to buy more. Really high quality and perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Raychee

customer_reviews.title: American made toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my 1 year old grandson. It is good quality, but the color was a little dull. It is made in USA from recycled plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was good.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it didn't have a lot of excess packaging, although I could have even done without the corrugated cardboard box it came in. However, that box was easy to open (required no scissors), so score A for the packaging. The bus is cute, but didn't seem to roll as fast as the cheap plastic trucks we already have. I bought some plastic figurines to put in the bus so the bus has passengers and it's easy to fit them into the bus through the opening in the top. Too early to tell if my toddler likes it, since it's his Christmas present and Christmas isn't for another week and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great school bus!
customer_reviews.text: Another Green Toys hit! My son loves them, and the school bus is no exception. He puts Green Toys figures and all kinds of other things in it.
customer_reviews.author: The Beve

customer_reviews.title: I made a terrible mistake. I DID receive both busses
customer_reviews.text: Recently I erroneously told you I only received one school bus. I had ordered 2. However, I made a terrible mistake. I DID receive both busses. Please forgive me for causing you so much trouble. Again, I received all that I ordered. I believe these Green Toys will last through the next two generations. They are made that well. Thanks, Jean Myers
customer_reviews.author: Jean Myers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toys!
customer_reviews.text: I love these toys they are perfect for about 4/5 months through 5 years. Maybe even more! Amazing bath toys, play in the sand or snow. They make really great gifts too!
customer_reviews.author: Pc_By_Design

customer_reviews.title: Piece of plastic
customer_reviews.text: This piece of yellow plastic was the worst mobile I ever bought for my grandson! Very poor quality, its wheels do not have a smooth mobility and move without coordination!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dillon

customer_reviews.title: "Green Toys" ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA, high quality, good price, recycled/recyclable materials (including the packaging), what's not to love? Plus, it's a great chance to support "Made In The USA." We have bought quite a few toys from this company and have never been disappointed, we love the stuff. Highly Recommend! I'm posting this same review for all of the "Green Toys" products we bought from Amazon. Thank you "Green Toys," for helping bring jobs and toy manufacturing back to the US.
customer_reviews.author: NorseFalconer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1.5 year old and he has been obsessed. Hands down one of his favorite toys. It’s really well made and study. He looks at it and sings wheels on the bus. We gave it to a friend of his for his birthday and the kid was soooo happy. Don’t hesitate, perfect toy.
customer_reviews.author: P.Lo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this school bus Works and rolls really good Don’t break easy Amazing product Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah ausbon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for two year old!
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys are GREAT! This school bus was a gift for my two year old granddaughter who is now halfway to 4yoa. It is holding up to daily play and is one of her most beloved toys!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Pillars

customer_reviews.title: My kid love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that you cannot find anywhere else but on Amazon. This is my boys favorite toy to go along with his favorite song "the wheels on the bus." Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Iiona

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit between the children at my daycare
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these green toys and they are sturdy and very well design. It resists 8-10 hours a day of children's joy and are easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Robles

customer_reviews.title: A bit noisy on wood, but great for play
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys can handle the rough play they get. Love that the top of the bus is open so my son can give other toys "rides." The wheels are rough plastic and make quite a bit of noise on the hardwood floors, but that's the price I pay for sturdy, green toys my kids love otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Wilder

customer_reviews.title: We Love Green Toys Products
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second Green Toys School Bus. The other lasted about 3 years in the hands of little boy who, unfortunately, LOVES to crash cars. It held up to years of rough play and a cross-country move, but it was definitely loved -- so we replaced it when the wheel broke off and was irreparable. Durable, dishwasher safe and fun indoors or out. We'd buy this - or any Green Toys product - again.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Back wheels do not turn.
customer_reviews.text: Well my son was super excited about this but then we realized that the back tires hardly turn.....will be returning. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Luv4Hart

customer_reviews.title: Green is good, very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Great toy that can fit many different "passengers" in the seats. The wheels work surprisingly well and it rolls across smoothly the floor with the various cargo that ends up in the top. I recommend it. I note I also purchased the Green Toys Fire Truck which does not roll well at all, the wheels lock up constantly and I'm disappointed in that item. Some better quality control is evidently needed.
customer_reviews.author: IWannaTalkToSamson

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried if my 2 yr old would recognize that is was a bus. It's a bit short a squatty, but she immediately started singing "Wheels on the Bus" when she opened it Christmas morning, so it wasn't a problem. Very sturdy, doesn't roll quiet as smoothly as other toys, but I imagine this is because the entire toy, including the axels, are plastic. It tends to roll a bit and then do sort of a Tokyo drift. Still very fun! Great to put Calico critters or a single small stuffed animal in for a ride.
customer_reviews.author: riss

customer_reviews.title: Strange smell
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed — the bus has a smell that will not come out after 10 hand washings plus the dishwasher!!! I don’t know if it’s from manufacturing or where it was stored for Amazon, but it has a strong perfume-like smell similar to dry cleaning that will not go away!!!!! Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Annie Price

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adorable.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES school buses, so this was a no-brainer amazon purchase. I love that Green Toys uses recycled materials and minimal packaging. My son now has several Green Toys - the bus, plane, and I think a dump truck. He loves them all! They are sturdy and able to withstand lots of bangs and crashes that are typical of toddler play time. These are toys that are really going to stick around through several kids - this is the kind of toy that can be passed along to younger relatives or friends, still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harris

customer_reviews.title: So this was a perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this bus. She really likes the song wheels on the bus. She is freaked out by the faces on Fisher Price vehicles. So this was a perfect replacement
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Tulbert

customer_reviews.title: Small Bus Good for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then expected for the price. I returned and bought the Fisher Price version.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Size is good and it is sturdy. A big hit with the grandson.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: My one-year-old grandson LOVES this toy. He loads it ...
customer_reviews.text: My one-year-old grandson LOVES this toy. He loads it up with smaller toys and zooms around. I bought him this for his birthday because when we are out for our walks he always gets excited when a school bus drives by. He also loves the song "The Wheels on the Bus go Round and Round" so we sing this song as he plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as usual for green toys
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like the wheels on the bus song? My toddlers loved this! We have many green toys becuase I trust the brand and quality and was once again happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doggylover

customer_reviews.title: Wheels on the bus...
customer_reviews.text: I love Green Toys. The only thing I'd change on the bus is that the little Green Toy figures should be able to sit in the seats!! Please make it so. I guess it would also be fun if the doors opened.
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: love green toys!
customer_reviews.text: first one came and the rear wheels were stuck and couldn't be turned without great effort so amazon sent me a free replacement. my 10 month old likes it, but she's still a little too small. she'll grow into it soon. love the green toys philosophy and will continue to support them when we get more toys in the future.
customer_reviews.author: HisNameWasSethRich

customer_reviews.title: dont think just click yes!
customer_reviews.text: love love green toys! such good quality and my son loves pretend play.. they are made in the USA.. will last much longer than the junk you see out there.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Son loves it and plays with it all the time. He’s 21 months.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Durable and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Super durable without tons of moving parts. My son is really rough on his toys and this has and will hold up. The open roof lets him put all his Duplo and action figures inside. I love Green Toys!
customer_reviews.author: Ralk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These toy trucks are the best! My son is 2 and is alittle rough on toys. These have definitely been great for him. He plays with them outside in the dirt and all I have to do is hose them off to clean them back up! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and other Green Toys (10 in all) during one of Amazon lightning deal offers. Although I had to pay extra for shipping overseas, we don't regret it one bit. Who knew recycling could be so much fun! These toys are really well constructed - sturdy and can stand a lot of abuse. I hope these stand the test of time (and my two kids 7 and 3).
customer_reviews.author: Abu Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great toys very sturdy take a beating and make a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Jonc

customer_reviews.title: Green toys rock
customer_reviews.text: We love Green Toys at our house. This bus is awesome. My son uses the little figures from other vehicles in the bus and it is so cute. The size is nice. I really appreciate the fact it is made from recycled material
customer_reviews.author: Em S

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these (diff trucks) for my triplet grandsons for their first birthday. They have been playing very hard with them for 8 mo's and they love them. The trucks are solid; no nicks or scratches or anything. I worried when I first bought them since the price is up there but there is no doubt in my mind these will last until the boys outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: We love this chunky little bus. I bought it for my one year old, but my three year old is equally entertained by it. The top is open and the little seats are the perfect size for our Play Mobil figures. The seats are very slippery though so they don't stay there for long. Anyway, this is a really great and super sturdy toy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We have and love all the Green Toys trucks. They get almost daily use at my house with my son, his friends (girls and boys), and the former in-home daycare I ran. Really sturdy, had for a couple years and they all look absolutely brand new. Made in USA out of non-toxic materials, and dishwasher safe. I buy this brand for gifts frequently and they are always well received. Recommend! Price is cheaper here on amazon than most anywhere I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves buses. But this ones does not ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves buses. But this ones does not have a moveable door--which is apparently a deal breaker for my kid...
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys Are The Best
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend any product from Green Toys enough. My son is obsessed with school buses and I love that these don't make noise.
customer_reviews.author: nmrtx5

customer_reviews.title: Big wheels are very good for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, durable toy. My boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine164

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Sustainable
customer_reviews.text: Our boys love their Green Toys, and we love the sustainable practices of the company! The toys are very durable and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: A. Veldhuisen

customer_reviews.title: Gender neutral, but unsure on life time
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this is that it is a neutral gender rolling toy. I didn't want a blue or pink dump truck. I wanted something that can work for both. I was disappointed that the wheels aren't too sturdy. But it works just fine as long as you don't put too much weight on it. I hope it lasts through a few kids.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like
customer_reviews.text: My kid is obsessed with buses and loves pushing this one around. Good quality, not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: BCook

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys
customer_reviews.text: Everything we've bought from Green Toys is always very durable and has a great design.
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift from our new baby to our 2 year old, and our toddler loves it. We have a few toys from this brand and have found them to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Buz

customer_reviews.title: Great toy brand
customer_reviews.text: Great toys! We have bought several of this brand and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie in GA

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite "school bus" toy
customer_reviews.text: My three year-old son loves school buses. He definitely loves this one and has been known to take it to bed with him (along with plenty of other toys). I would definitely recommend buying this school bus toy. It is of sound quality and best of all it is "Made in the USA." Again, it is a high quality made product and does not feel flimsy and/or cheap to the touch. I think it will give years of unforgettable playtime.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he loves it ! I love no batteries! It’s toddler powered !!! So durable and great size for toddler hands
customer_reviews.author: Joe Teterus

customer_reviews.title: Cute eco toys
customer_reviews.text: Love Green Toys' commitment to the environment, and will choose first from their product line for gifts for my grandsons. This bus is super cute, easy to handle, very durable and minimally packaged. Your kids will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Loriann

customer_reviews.title: Great great toy
customer_reviews.text: It's not cheap, for a toy, I will note that. However, it is made in USA, which is RARE for toys. It is also "green". I know green toys can be a fad/scam/trend/whatever but I can tell right away that this product was quality. The plastic feels so much better than any other plastic toys my son has. And it doesnt have that plastic smell like other toys do. My son puts his stuffed animals in the seats and plays with it. Great design, great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Boring and defective
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with the wheels so it’s a super bumpy ride and doesn’t glide far. Babies didn’t even want to play with it
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandson, very sturdy. He loves school buses right now & this was perfect & priced right!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Great Big Bus
customer_reviews.text: Love this member of the Green Toy family. Rolls so smoothly. This bus is a big chunky yellow fun toy. Baby loves to smoosh stuffed animals in to top and roll across the room. Green toys are well made and have no graphics. Let little ones use their imagination. As always I'm trusting that this company is using safe non toxic plastic as they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Muz

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, Love the brand
customer_reviews.text: My boys love green toys. Best age (2 to 3). These toys are simple, sturdy, and made with recycled plastic. My 2 year old loves loading the bus with toys and driving it around. I am a fan of simple toys that do not require batteries and lead to creative play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for children
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 years old and loves all his green toys. I like the simple design and the sturdiness. I grew up playing with cars and such things and it’s refreshing seeing my son enjoy items like this one unlike tablets or iPads where a child can’t fully appreciate imagination.
customer_reviews.author: jessica a.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: The wheels turn. The toy is sturdy and easy for toddlers to roll or carry.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ready sturdy and easy for little ones to push around.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice size toy & good price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. My son loves his school bus
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, fun toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a very picky friend who will only let her child have wooden toys and super-eco-friendly stuff. Both my friend and her 2 year old loved the bus, much to my relief! A year and many play dates later, bus still looks and works great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toys for inside and outside.
customer_reviews.text: Green toys are the best my son loves both his bus and truck and is always playing with them. Also very durable - they have been dropped, thrown, stepped on and still look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: fun toy. i love this company
customer_reviews.text: fun toy. i love this company. good quality and durability. my daughter plays with this while we camp and has all the rocks go to school. would love people to put inside.
customer_reviews.author: andrea lobb

customer_reviews.title: Well made cute toys
customer_reviews.text: Order several items for my 2 years old son and my hubby like them very much as well.Made by recyclable milk milk jugs. But look very solid, most important thing is, the items well made, no sharp corner and no metal screw. So i can leave to toddler play it without any concern special in water. Sure will recommend to my friends who have kid to have more fun together with this simple great toys.Looking forward some more new design from this company and I would happy to purchase more form my son and for myself if any nice.
customer_reviews.author: tchen

customer_reviews.title: Would totally buy again
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old loves school buses, and this was one of her favorite birthday presents. it's well made and toddler proof.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday gift for an 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Best birthday gift for an 1 year old, really. Usually. I bought it for my friend's kid first, it was his favorite toy. Bought it for my own kid next, he's kind of eh about it. But it's big, durable and light and has wheels. That's all toddlers want out of a toy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Nice bus
customer_reviews.text: Good toy, nice bus, very durable but my boys don't play with the bus as much as they use the fire truck, tractor or the dump truck. Perhaps if the bus had opening doors and a bus driver, my kids would be more interactive.
customer_reviews.author: stasi

customer_reviews.title: pretty good.  wheels could use some work
customer_reviews.text: The toy feels like a lot of thought went into its design. It is very cute and fun for my daughter. The thing I don't like about it is that the wheels are independently attached (no axle) and they look very wobbly when the bus rolls. So far they have held, but I always feel like they are about to fall off. I love the idea of good quality toys made from recycled materials. I think the quality is almost there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fishel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Well made, Great Bus!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old LOVES buses right now (thanks to the "wheels on the bus"). I got him this Green Toys School Bus for Easter, and he absolutely LOVES it! It's very sturdy and well made. The overall size of the bus is large and goes perfectly with his other big trucks. I would definitely get other products from Green Toys.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome well-made, simple toys! Great for my little boy who just loves to roll around his trucks and honestly doesn't need any more bells and whistles than just a great toy that will stand up to his boy energy. I love Green Toys and these ones are no exception. Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: M. Keifer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: it is a very sturdy and nice-looking toy. my son loves it. I like gree toys!
customer_reviews.author: Abhirav Kushwaha

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two year old, who is pretty rough with his toys, for his birthday and he plays with it almost every day! I love green toys in general but the school bus is our favorite, it’s so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have your Cake (with Frosting) and eat it too.
customer_reviews.text: The "Cake" is that this School Bus is Made in the USA. The "Frosting" is that this School Bus is Environment Friendly, made from recycled plastic. The "Eat it too" is that my child loves this entire product line. We have purchase multiple items from Green Toys, and there isn't any one toy my child does not play with. Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: BAMAJR

customer_reviews.title: Our toddlers current favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is our 18 month old's current favorite toy. He carries it around everywhere and likes 'driving' it around the kitchen. When we sing wheels on the bus or read a wheels on the bus book, he always looks for this bus to bring over. I appreciate knowing that's it's made in the US of recycled plastic. Win-win! UPDATE: I decided to come back and update my review because, 3 months later, this bus is still a favorite and it's in perfect condition. My toddler is now into loading his Sesame Street characters into the bus and driving them around the house!
customer_reviews.author: RRNMCW

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: My twins love this and the other green toys vehicles. They are made well,durable and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a 1 year olds birthday and he loved it! It's a nice big size and well ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 1 year olds birthday and he loved it! It's a nice big size and well built. It will definitely hold up to his wild, baby play. I wish my boys would have had this when they were younger.
customer_reviews.author: FakePlasticTreesTop Contributor: Makeup

product_meta.title: Green Toys School Bus
product_meta.description:
GREEN TOYS SCHOOL BUS
School’s in session with the planet’s favorite new kid in class – the Green Toys School Bus! This sturdy bus is ready to be loaded up for an earth-friendly ride to the classroom, a field trip, or whatever excursion little scholars see fit. Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic milk jugs. No BPA, PVC or phthalates. Recommended for ages 1 and up.

The unique open roof design makes it easy for kids to load in passengers, and also to hold and maneuver the bus as they roll it along. Recycled plastic versus virgin plastic saves tremendous amounts of energy. CLASSIC TOYS WITH AN ECO FRIENDLY TWIST
This School Bus is not your typical toy vehicle. Manufactured and assembled in the USA, it’s made from 100% post consumer recycled plastic milk jugs (HDPE #2 plastic) that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. With no external coatings, paints, or dyes, this super-safe, durable toy is good for the earth and safe and fun for little ones. It’s also packaged in recycled and recyclable materials with no plastic films or twist ties, and printed with soy ink.

IMAGINITIVE PLAY - INSIDE OR OUTSIDE
Preschoolers will love wheeling this bus on all sorts of adventures. With 17 windows and a long open roof, children have the freedom to load in any number of passengers for each ride, whether in the driver’s seat up front, the long bench in the back, or one of the four seats in the middle. From the dials on the dashboard to the electric plug in the back, all of the careful details on this bus help bring imaginative role play to life.

OLD-FASHIONED FUN THAT'S MADE IN THE USA!
Like all Green Toys products, the School Bus is manufactured in the USA with a tight, local supply chain that minimizes transportation emissions and supports the domestic economy. Specifically designed without metal axles and also dishwasher safe, it's great for both indoor and outdoor play since it won't rust and is easy to clean!

 
 

Green Toys products are made from 100% recycled plastic milk jugs (#2 recycled HDPE).  
 

AT A GLANCE
 * Ages: One and up 
 * Requires: Ready to play indoors or out 
 * Made in the USA from 100 percent recycled milk jugs 
 * Sturdy design features open roof and no metal axles 
 * Encourages development of gross and fine motor skills 
 * Phthalate and BPA free 
 * US supply chain reduces greenhouse gas and saves energy 
 * Easy to clean--can even go in the dishwasher 
 * Fat Brain Toy Award 2012 Winner



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
School's in session with the planet's favorite new kid in class - the Green Toys School Bus. Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic milk containers that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions, this sturdy bus is ready to be loaded up for a ride to the classroom, a field trip or whatever excursion little scholars see fit. The Green Toys School Bus goes to the head of the class for safety, with no metal axels or external coatings. No BPA, PVC or phthalates. Packaged using only recycled and recyclable materials.
feature_bullets: School's in session with the planet's favorite new kid in class.
Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic milk containers that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
This sturdy bus is ready to be loaded up for a ride to the classroom, a field trip or whatever excursion little scholars see fit.
